description:
Agent Module for Acarda Outbound Team Edition.

	_This software requires a licensed Acarda Outbound Server instance for the agent to connect to._
	
	## Package Parameters
	The following package parameters are supported:
	
	* `/server:` - Set the Acarda Outbound Server Address
	* `/port:` - Set the Acarda Outbount Server Port
	
	> If you do not specify a Server Address parameter then the software will ask you for the Server Address on first run.
	
	To pass parameters, use `--params="/server:server.address.com /port:4567"`.
summary: Outbound Call Center and Telemarketing Dialer for Teams.
author: Innovasoft Limited
